ygData.subject: Re: RE: [EQ-Necromancers] Expansion Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I m fairly convinced that at least some of the new spells that have been posted are red herrings put in the spell.dat by Verant just because they know people
ygData.messageBody:
I'm fairly convinced that at least some of the new spells that have been
posted are red herrings put in the spell.dat by Verant just because they
know people analyze that thing constantly. A friend of mine also brought up
a good point. Unless the mana given for each level is changed for post 50,
people are really going to feel a squeeze, some of the mana requirements for
those new spells are insane, and if our mana adjustment remains constant,
we'll have 20% more mana at level 60 but spells that require 100% more...I
can't wait to see how Verant figures this all out.

On the bright side, for some of our lower level friends. If shadowknights
are getting the 39/44 pet, they can't make those research only anymore. It
will be interesting to see how they work out research. Since we get spells
at each level, will the components for that level spell *only* drop off a
mob of that level? IE: level 55 pet requires words of insanely rare, do
those only drop off level 55 mobs? If that's the case I fear the future my
friends.
